generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with lane markings and traffic cones, indicating it is a road for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: There is a pedestrian crossing area with white markings and a curb, which is a sidewalk for pedestrians.
- building: Multiple multi-story buildings with windows and architectural details are visible in the background.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are visible along the roadside and in the foreground.
- terrain: There is grass and soil visible along the curb and in the foreground.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
- car: A silver van and a black SUV are visible on the road.
- bus: A blue public transport bus is visible on the road.
- train: The blue bus is a tram, which is a type of train running on rails.
- traffic light: A red traffic light is visible above the road.
- traffic sign: A crossbuck sign (railroad crossing sign) is visible on the left side of the image.
- pole: Traffic light poles and other vertical poles are visible in the image.
- fence: A white fence with advertisements is visible on the right side of the image.
